bioAsHtml: Andreas Evers is a principal Java consultant at Ordina, passionate about the Spring ecosystem, microservices, REST, clean code and best practices in general. An avid open source enthusiast and Spring contributor. Helps fellow developers regarding architecture and best practices by giving workshops, talks and courses about the newest technologies. Currently employed as technical lead for the design and implementation of the new e-domain architecture at Proximus.

acceptedTalks.title: Spring REST Docs - Documenting RESTful APIs using your tests
